topic.title: Obtaining and Registering a License Key for

body.p: is not free software. To enable and use , you need a license.

For demonstration and evaluation purposes, a time limited license is available upon request at . This license is supplied at no cost for a period of 30 days from the date of issue. During this period, the software is fully functional, enabling you to test all its functionality. To continue using the software after the trial period, you must purchase a permanent license. If a trial period greater than 30 days is required, please contact .
